Segment.name: EQ
Segment.comment: To specify inquired eligibility or benefit information

Field.name: ServiceTypeCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the classification of service

Field.name: CompositeMedicalProcedureIdentifier
Field.comment: To identify a medical procedure by its standardized codes and applicable modifiers

Field.name: CoverageLevelCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the level of coverage being provided for this insured

Field.name: InsuranceTypeCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the type of insurance policy within a specific insurance program

SyntaxNote.name: R0102
SyntaxNote.comment: At least one of EQ01 or EQ02 is required.
